questions.name: question 1
questions.questionPrompt: Which join function is best for the task of adding the full airline name to the count of departures by carrier?

answers.label: Right join
answers.feedbackMessage: Because a right_join() keeps all of the rows in the right table, airlines, it introduces rows with missing values for carriers in airlines that didn't fly on this day.

messages.correct: That's right! We'll stick with left joins in this tutorial, but the concepts we're learning apply to all joins

messages.correct: Great work! Both year and tailnum were used in the join. But do these columns mean the same thing in both tables?
